sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ENTRPS_INFO_F ( ENTRPSCD , ENTRPS_NM , ENTRPS_TY , BSNM_SE , RPRSNTV_NM , BIZRNO , CPRREGISTNO , INDUTY , BIZCND , TLPHON_NO , ZIP , ADRES , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , FAX ) VALUES ( #entrpscd# , #entrpsNm# , #entrpsTy# , #bsnmSe# , #rprsntvNm# , #bizrno# , #cprregistno# , #induty# , #bizcnd# , #tlphonNo# , #zip# , #adres# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE , #fax# )

INSERT INTO ENTRPS_CHARGER_F ( CHARGER_NO , ENTRPSCD , CHARGER_NM , CHARGER_OFC_POS , CHRG_JOB , CHARGER_MOBLPHON_NO , CHARGER_TLPHON_NO , CHARGER_FAX , CHARGER_EMAIL , CHARGER_DEPT , MNG_DEPT_CD , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CHARGER_NO+1),1) FROM ENTRPS_CHARGER_F WHERE entrpscd = #entrpscd#) , #entrpscd# , #chargerNm# , #chargerOfcPos# , #chrgJob# , #chargerMoblphonNo# , #chargerTlphonNo# , #chargerFax# , #chargerEmail# , #chargerDept# , #mngDeptCd# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_CD SET GIS_TY=#gisTy#, GIS_DATA=#gisData#, HREF=#href# WHERE GISCD=#giscd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ENTRPSCD AS entrpscd , ENTRPS_NM AS entrpsNm , ENTRPS_TY AS entrpsTy , BSNM_SE AS bsnmSe , RPRSNTV_NM AS rprsntvNm , SUBSTR(BIZRNO, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(BIZRNO, 4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(BIZRNO, 6,5) AS bizrno , SUBSTR(CPRREGISTNO, 0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(CPRREGISTNO, 7,8) AS cprregistno , INDUTY AS induty , BIZCND AS bizcnd , TLPHON_NO AS tlphonNo , SUBSTR(ZIP, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(ZIP, 4,3) AS zip , ADRES AS adres , REG_USR AS regUsr , REGIST_DT AS registDt , UPD_USR AS updUsr , UPDT_DT AS updtDt , FAX AS fax FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT ENTRPSCD, ENTRPS_NM, ENTRPS_TY, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM020' AND CODE = ENTRPS_TY) AS ENTRPS_TY_DISPLAY, BSNM_SE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM018' AND CODE = BSNM_SE) AS BSNM_SE_DISPLAY, RPRSNTV_NM, SUBSTR(BIZRNO, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(BIZRNO, 4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(BIZRNO, 6,5) AS BIZRNO, SUBSTR(CPRREGISTNO, 0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(CPRREGISTNO, 7,8) AS CPRREGISTNO, INDUTY, BIZCND, TLPHON_NO, SUBSTR(ZIP, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(ZIP, 4,3) AS ZIP, ADRES, REG_USR, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REGIST_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DT, UPD_USR, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(UPDT_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_DT, FAX FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd#
AND ENTRPS_TY = #entrpsTy#
AND BIZRNO LIKE #bizrno# || '%'
AND BSNM_SE = #bsnmSe#
ORDER BY ENTRPSCD DESC )Z ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd#
AND ENTRPS_TY = #entrpsTy#
AND BIZRNO LIKE #bizrno# || '%'
AND BSNM_SE = #bsnmSe#
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT CHARGER_NO, ENTRPSCD, CHARGER_NM, CHARGER_OFC_POS, CHRG_JOB, CHARGER_MOBLPHON_NO, CHARGER_TLPHON_NO, CHARGER_FAX, CHARGER_EMAIL, CHARGER_DEPT, MNG_DEPT_CD FROM ENTRPS_CHARGER_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd# ORDER BY CHARGER_NO DESC, ENTRPSCD DESC )Z ) W WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ENTRPS_CHARGER_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd#

SELECT CHARGER_NO AS chargerNo , ENTRPSCD AS entrpscd , CHARGER_NM as chargerNm , CHARGER_OFC_POS AS chargerOfcPos , CHRG_JOB AS chrgJob , CHARGER_MOBLPHON_NO AS chargerMoblphonNo , CHARGER_TLPHON_NO AS chargerTlphonNo , CHARGER_FAX AS chargerFax , CHARGER_EMAIL AS chargerEmail , CHARGER_DEPT AS chargerDept , MNG_DEPT_CD AS mngDeptCd FROM ENTRPS_CHARGER_F WHERE CHARGER_NO = #chargerNo# AND ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd#
